stimulusHtml:
Before listening to the first playing, please look at the staff below. Notice that there are nine chords in the progression; the soprano and bass notes and the Roman numeral of the first chord are given.

Remember to notate only the soprano and bass voices and to provide the numerals indicating the chords and their inversions.

features.html:
You will hear a harmonic progression in four parts. The progression will be played four times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a one-minute pause after each subsequent playing. For each question, please do the following.

  1. Notate only the soprano and bass voices. Do not notate the alto and tenor voices.

  2. On the lines provided under the staff, write in the Roman and Arabic numerals that indicate the chords and their inversions.
